alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Dyer; Haywood; Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 8:59AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Crockett, south central Dyer, Lauderdale and northern Haywood Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 859 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ripley, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dyersburg, Ripley, Halls, Chestnut Bluff, Nutbush, Belle Eagle, Bradleytown, Forked Deer, Unionville, Henning, Gates, Papaw Ridge, Porter Gap, Edith, Fowlkes, Dryhill, Christmasville, Double Bridges, Jenkinsville and Luckett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
